title: Core Java Crash Course Complete Java Tutorial in One Video
description:
core java crash course
core java crash course covering all core java topics in one video.
this core java crash course is a complete guide for beginners and interview preparation.

This core java crash course is a complete java tutorial covering everything required for beginners, students, and interview preparation.

Topics covered in this video:
1. What is Java
2. Java Program Structure
3. Variables and Data Types
4. Operators
5. Control Statements
6. Arrays
7. Strings
8. Methods
9. OOPS Concepts
10. Constructors
11. Exception Handling
12. Collections Framework
13. Java 8 Features
14. Multithreading

This video is perfect for:
- Java beginners
- Core Java interview preparation
- College students
- Backend developers

English subtitles included.

core java crash course

title: Microservices OAuth2 Crash Course, Auth Server Client Resource Server
description:
microservices oauth2 crash course with auth server client server and resource server.
microservices oauth2 crash course tutorial for auth server client server and resource server.


You will learn OAuth2 flows, token generation, validation, and secure communication between microservices using Spring Boot and Spring Security.

What you will learn:
- OAuth2 architecture in microservices
- Auth Server vs Client vs Resource Server
- Access token and refresh token flow
- Spring Security OAuth2 implementation
- Real-world microservices security design
- Production-ready authentication setup

Perfect for backend developers, Spring Boot engineers, and interview preparation.

English subtitles included.
